kDesc
If you need to ask about it, you'll never really "get" it.[#Legal]
Ne cherchez pas, vous ne pouvez pas comprendre.[#Legal]
Wenn Sie fragen müssen, werden Sie es wahrscheinlich nie begreifen. [#Legal]
Non chiederti cosa rappresenti: fa già la sua figura.[#Legal]
Si tienes que preguntar, es que no lo entenderás nunca.[#Legal]
If you need to ask about it, you'll never really "get" it.[#Legal]
무슨 의미인지 물어봐야 한다면, 아마 당신은 영원히 이해할 수 없을 겁니다. [#Legal]
If you need to ask about it, you'll never really "get" it.[#Legal]
即使問了，你也不能真正明白其概念。[#Legal]
即使問了，你也不能真正明白其概念。[#Legal]
If you need to ask about it, you'll never really "get" it.[#Legal]
